item.title: JavaScript and Emacs, and updates
item.description:
Well, thankfully, summer classes are almost over (tomorrow is the last class). I have a big paper to write for one of them, due at the worst time possible - July 5th. The day after what is, probably, one of the busiest days of the year for the ambulance corps.

item.title: OpenOffice Calc formula for IP addresses
item.description:
It’s been a while since I’ve posted. Things are quite busy, with work 4 days a week (9-5) and classes 6-9:30 at night 4 days a week (though classes are Mon-Thurs and work is Tues-Fri).

I’m plodding along on with TuxTruck - we now have a …
